system.requirements: Tier 3; T 40, WP 40, Implanted Potentia Coil or Mechanicus Implants, Integrated Weapon Expertise. Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Defence
system.effect: As a Free Action, character can gain up to Toughness Bonus Fatigue, for each Fatigue gained, they add +1 to Damage and Penetration for all of their Integrated Weapons for WP Bonus Rounds.
